title: For Whom the Poll Airs
abstract: Journal Article For Whom the Poll Airs: Comparing Poll Results to Television Poll Coverage Get access Kathleen Searles, Kathleen Searles 1Kathleen Searles is an assistant professor in the Department of Political Science and the Manship School of Mass Communication at Louisiana State University, Baton Rouge, LA, USA. Martha Humphries Ginn is an associate professor in the Department of Political Science at Augusta University, Augusta, GA, USA. Jonathan Nickens is a PhD candidate in the Department of Political Science at Louisiana State University, Baton Rouge, LA, USA. The authors thank Martin Johnson, Tom Silver, and three anonymous reviewers for their helpful comments. The authors are also very grateful to Mark Blumenthal for sharing his data; without his generosity, this paper would not have been possible. The authors also thank Richard Ledbetter, Karen Denny, Brittany Matthews, Matthew Perkins, Sophie Spencer, and Julia Chenault for their research assistance. This research is funded in part by the Darlene & Thomas O. Ryder Professorship in the Manship School of Mass Communication at LSU, which is held by Searles.
